alert.note: Alert for Jack (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 7:27PM CDT until May 11 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL JACK COUNTY... At 727 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles east of Jacksboro, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Lake Bridgeport around 800 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Cundiff. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows. Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
